fields_of_interest: Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Communication
head_office_address: TENAGA NASIONAL BERHAD Level 2, Tenaga Nasional Berhad Headquarters No. 129, Jalan Bangsar
eu_initiatives: The main interest now is the data protection law concerning EU such Data Protection Directive and GPDR that will coming into force on 25 May 2017.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: TNB is the Malaysia’s leading electricity utility with a presence throughout Peninsular Malaysia, Sabah and Labuan. We have also established a name for ourselves in the region, making TNB one of the largest electricity companies in Asia. We also believe in empowering the community, greening the Nation, nurturing a vibrant workplace as well as setting standards in the marketplace.
